https://tmrev.io/movie/218726-Doraemon: Nobita's Secret Gadget Museum 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2GdSk2j7pbuEnuyJibH7YLKHwos.jpg While Doraemon is asleep, a famous thief comes and steals his cat-bell. Without his cat-bell, Doraemon starts to act more and more like a normal cat. In order to stop this, Nobita, Shizuka, Suneo, and Gian have to go and search for his bell, so they go to a factory where all of Doraemon's gadgets are made. Doraemon: Nobita's Secret Gadget Museum
